reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my toddler grandson who absolutely LOVES "Super Why". By all accounts, he loved this one, too.
This is such a great program for my grandkids.  My 2 year old learned his letters before he was 1 because of this program.
Nephew was quite excited to see this gift.  "This is my favorite video".  That's all it took was one big smile!

We like the Super Why brand and this is one of many videos we have. It is action packed and has lots of learning activities. The underwater theme is especially entertaining for our child as he loves the sea and all that you will find in it.  Would def purchase again.
Good product, excellent for a two year old boy.  Ontime shipment and arrived in excellent condition.  I would reccomend this product to all parents with young children.
The NEW Super Why! Under the Sea (DVD) is wonderful!  Of course my six year old likes all the Super Why DVD's!
Shipped pretty fast and my grand daughter really enjoys watching the DVD. We watched it together and I liked it too.  It's not violent like so many kids show and they learn while they watch.
daughter loved it
My grandson loves Super Wyatt.
What can I say, another hit with my almost 3 yr old grandson. I wish Amazon sold more Super Why DVD's as they are a true hit!
my grandson really really liked it.
cool.
My grandson loves Super Why. Has a moral to the story using the fairy tales and characters even I grew up with. They also teach spelling and reading along the way.
Our Grandkids love the cd's. It teaches them quite a bit and it is asked for many times. Clearly written. Children understand it well
My son has played these till the discs are just tired heheh. Great price and was a perfect buy for his birthday
my daughter loves super why she watches this dvd over and over and over. Super why is a great show for kids. my daughter just turned 2 and knows all her abc's and can count to 20. thank you!
My grandson seems delighted ergo the five star rating. I should have let him answer but he's only five.
Perfect gift for my grandson.

Four episodes included:
1. The Beach Day Mystery
2. The Little Mermaid
3. The Swiss Family Robinson
4. Tiddalick the Frog

Special Features:
Music Video - Rhyming Time
Game - "Sun" & "Hat"
